resources.string: Please, check your internet connection and try again.
The WI-FI network is deactivated. It is recommended to activate it in order not to consume mobile data.
Channel broadcast is not available at this time. Try again?
Watch TV for free on your android device!

TV Online Pro will be available on Google Play soon as a paid version without ads. Please consider Buy it if you like it and want to support the development of the App. If you have any questions, problems or ideas related to the application do not hesitate to contact me at amgsoftsol18@gmail.com

Thank you for purchasing the Pro version. Soon we will add extra features. If you have Any question, problem or idea related to the application, do not hesitate to contact me at amgsoftsol18@gmail.com

All television stations that are available in the application transmit their content for free through links that are available to all users. If you are the owner of one of these channels and want to modify or delete the corresponding channel from the TV Online Free application, I ask you to contact me at amgsoftsol18@gmail.com and I will make the modification or elimination of the link immediately. The images that represent the logo of the channels are taken Internet and therefore are considered part of the public domain. These logos belong their respective owners, who can exercise their right of elimination or modification by contacting the previous email. It is understood that in order to avoid an incorrect claim that causes the prejudice of all, the requests the above must be sent only by their respective owners or legal representatives.
